posts.post_content:
Use innocent blood, sac the Gatekeeper. They sac a creature.  
  
Then, all must sac a creature as a result of it dying.  
  
All players sac 2 creatures. Not just the opponents.
posts.html:

All players sac 2 creatures. Not just the opponents.

posts.post_content:
Gerrard is probably my least favorite character in magic...   
Here you have an interesting monster thing... That makes everything die... and he walks up to it and threatens to knock it out... Thus stealing the spotlight and making a bad joke...  
Anyway, great card... I think I'll put it it my new creature sac deck.
